## Type Safety

TypeScript brings type safety to JavaScript.

## Generics

TypeScript generics are similar to Go generics.

## Error Handling

TypeScript uses exceptions; Go uses explicit returns.

## Conclusion

TypeScript is a natural fit for Go developers.
